item.title: Oxford Road Brent Side, 4th November
item.description:
Beyond the fact that the street is full of leaves and trash, the street is full of bags from last week’s cleaning, almost a week now

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Oxford Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Thames water can’t install stop valve to our property -, 4th November
item.description:
Thames water have told us they can’t install a stop valve externally to our property which means we can’t turn off our water or have the means to disconnect in a emergency (given Thames water issues in bromley) They have suggested for them to gain access the lighting column needs to be removed as it’s clashing with their services. Could this please be arranged so I can have emergency way of cutting off the water please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lubbock Road, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ankle deep in leaves, 4th November
item.description:
Hi, Can you please send your street sweeping machine into Harleyford which is a council road to clear the leaves which are ankle deep again. The machine cleared Upper Park Road but didn’t bother to come into Harleyford. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harleyford, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Contractors cutting grass yesterday have taken render of my wall. Was ok before works started. Already had section replaced 2 years ago as hit with machine., 4th November
item.description:
Ride on machine hit my external wall again casing rendering to fall off. Live on slope and already told contractors machine should not be used. Wife passed away a few days ago and l really dont need to be dealing with this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thirlmere Road, Barnehurst, London

item.title: Van Dumped outside Keats Estate, 4th November
item.description:
This vehicle has been abandoned for months. It has not tax or mot as per the database. This vehicle needs to be removed as it could be used of illegal purposes etc. I can see a similar report last month but nothing has been done. The council need to sort
